suggestions.original: To improve the picture organization, consider filling the empty space on the right side of the artwork. This could be achieved by adding background elements such as a simple landscape, additional objects, or even a subtle pattern. This will help balance the composition and make the artwork feel more complete. Additionally, ensuring that the elements on the left side do not overpower the right side will contribute to a more harmonious and engaging piece.
